description: The Mistress has decided she wants to use and abuse her leather-loving slave. He must obey her every command and take whatever sadistic pleasures she desires to inflict upon him. She wants her long leather gloves licked before moving on to the bed where she sets about some hard face slapping. His face then proves to be the perfect resting place for her leather-clad arse. He is then made to lick, kiss, and caress her soft leather thigh boots before removing them to worship her bare feet.
title: A Sensually Sadistic Mood
